about_the_game:
Step into the epic realm of Fantasy Knight, a breathtaking action-adventure game where courage and magic collide! Take on the mantle of a legendary knight, armed with a gleaming sword and formidable magical prowess, as you traverse a stunningly crafted fantasy world teeming with peril and wonder.

Fantasy Knight offers a dynamic combat system that seamlessly blends swift swordplay with powerful magic spells. Engage in heart-pounding battles, mastering devastating combos and unlocking mystical abilities to decimate your foes. Harness the elemental forces of fire, ice, and lightning to aid you in your quest.

Explore and Conquer: Venture through scorched wastelands, treacherous volcanic mountains, and ancient lava-filled ruins. Each environment is intricately designed, brimming with hidden secrets, treacherous traps, and formidable adversaries.

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey of heroism and magic in Fantasy Knight. The fate of Ignis rests in your hands—will you rise to the challenge and become the hero the kingdom desperately needs?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: A rouge RPG, action and sword fighting game. Use special moves, special powers and magic to defeat all monsters and creatures waiting for you down the road.
